Comment: Abilities: A09D (Acid Bomb), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Hurls a flask of acid at a target.  The flask breaks upon impact, splashing a powerful acid on nearby hostile units.|n|nDecreases armor by <A09D,DataC1>; deals 20 damage per second to the primary target; deals 6 damage to nearby targets.|n|cffffcc00Lasts 12(3 for Heroes) seconds.
